Classes/BDBeaconInfo.html.abstract: @brief Information about a BLE Beacon, as defined in Point Access.

Classes/BDBoundingBox.html.name: BDBoundingBox
Classes/BDBoundingBox.html.abstract: @brief A rectangular coordinate region on the Earth’s surface, defined by two latitude / longitude corner @ref BDPoint “points”.

Classes/BDCircle.html.name: BDCircle
Classes/BDCircle.html.abstract: @brief A circular region on the Earth’s surface, defined by a center @ref BDPoint “point” and a radius, in meters.

Classes/BDFenceInfo.html.name: BDFenceInfo
Classes/BDFenceInfo.html.abstract: @brief Information about a geofence, as defined in Point Access.

Classes/BDLineString.html.name: BDLineString
Classes/BDLineString.html.abstract: @brief Open-ended geometry consisting of two or more @ref BDPoint “points” connected by straight-line segments.

Classes/BDLocation.html.name: BDLocation
Classes/BDLocation.html.abstract: Represents a recorded, geographic location; combining a geographic @ref BDPointSDK “point” with an altitude, as well as a known

Classes/BDLocationManager.html.name: BDLocationManager
Classes/BDLocationManager.html.abstract: Entry-point for your Application’s interaction with Point SDK. This is a subclass of CLLocationManager and is intended as a drop-in replacement while providing additional features.

Classes/BDPoint.html.name: BDPoint
Classes/BDPoint.html.abstract: @brief A geographic point expressed in latitude and longitude coordinates.

Classes/BDPointOverlayRendererFactory.ht.name: BDPointOverlayRendererFactory
Classes/BDPointOverlayRendererFactory.ht.abstract: @brief Produces MapKit overlay renderers for @ref BDFenceInfo and @ref BDBeaconInfo overlays.

Classes/BDPointSessionException.html.name: BDPointSessionException
Classes/BDPointSessionException.html.abstract: @brief Thrown when the Point SDK session life-cycle or authentication state has been violated.

Classes/BDPolygon.html.name: BDPolygon
Classes/BDPolygon.html.abstract: @brief Arbitrary region on the Earth’s surface, comprised of two or more @ref BDPoint “points” connected by straight-line segments.

Classes/BDPolygonal.html.name: BDPolygonal
Classes/BDPolygonal.html.abstract: @brief Base-class for @ref BDGeometry “geometries” defined by an ordered series of @ref BDPoint “points”.

Classes/BDZoneInfo.html.name: BDZoneInfo
Classes/BDZoneInfo.html.abstract: @brief Contains information about a Zone, including the set of @ref BDFenceInfo “fences” that comprise it.
